traits.name: Feline agility
traits.desc: When the tabaxi moves on its turn in combat, it can double its speed until the end of the turn. Once it uses this ability, the tabaxi can't use it again until it moves 0 feet on one of its turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tabaxi makes two attacks with its claws, its shortsword, or its shortbow.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (ld4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (l d6 +3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (ld6 +3) piercing damage.
